alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Raft River Region; Shoshone, Lava Beds; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 7:06PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms with winds up to 55 mph and penny size hail will impact the eastern Magic Valley through 745 PM MDT... At 704 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Paul, or 8 miles northwest of Rupert, moving east at 50 mph. Another storm was located just northwest of Hazelton. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Burley, Rupert, Heyburn, Lake Walcott, Paul, Declo, Minidoka, Cold Water Rest Area, Acequia, Yale Rest Area and Interstate 84 And 86 Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Magic Valley; Raft River Region; Shoshone, Lava Beds; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains
